header.title: SafetyHelp
header.tagline: T≈°ireletso Ea Hao, Ho Latela Ho Entsoe ka Mokhoa o Bonolo‚ÄîNako e Fe kapa e Fe, Kae kapa Kae
sidebar.step_0.title: üìú Amoheloa ho SafetyHelp
sidebar.step_0.description: Hlahloba lisebelisoa tsa rona tse felletseng le lisebelisoa ho ntlafatsa t≈°ireletso ea bophelo bo botle ba mosebetsi le t≈°ireletso sebakeng sa hau sa mosebetsi.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ‚ö° Na u tseba hore ho sebelisa bafani ba thepa ba t≈°epahalang le ba nang le boit≈°oaro bo botle ho ka fokotsa likotsi sebakeng sa mosebetsi ka ho netefatsa hore mosebetsi o phethoa ka nako le ka maemo a holimo a boleng le t≈°ireletso?
intro.title: Amoheloa ho SafetyHelp
intro.description: Hlahloba lisebelisoa tsa rona tse felletseng le lisebelisoa ho ntlafatsa t≈°ireletso ea bophelo bo botle ba mosebetsi le t≈°ireletso sebakeng sa hau sa mosebetsi.
welcome.title: Amoheloa ho SafetyHelp
welcome.description: Sethala sa hau se t≈°epahalang sa t≈°ireletso ea bophelo bo botle ba mosebetsi (OHS) Afrika Borwa. Re fana ka lisebelisoa tse ikemetseng, tse matlafatsoang ke AI ho netefatsa t≈°ireletso le ho latela melao libakeng tsa mosebetsi, likolong, likerekeng, le likarolong tse sa hlophisoang. Kopanela le sechaba sa rona ho fumana lisebelisoa, lit≈°ebeletso, le t≈°ehetso e etselitsoeng litlhoko tsa hau ka boikhethelo.
why_choose.title: Ke Hobaneng o Lokela ho Khetha SafetyHelp Bakeng sa Ho Latela OHS?
why_choose.content: SafetyHelp ke molekane oa hau ea t≈°epahalang ho latela t≈°ireletso ea bophelo bo botle ba mosebetsi Afrika Borwa. Sethala sa rona se fana ka lisebelisoa tse felletseng tse etselitsoeng ho fihlela litlhoko tse ikhethileng tsa liindasteri tse kang kaho, merafo, le tlhahiso. Ho tloha ho bopa lirejisetara tsa molao ho ea ho tlhahlobo ea kotsi, SafetyHelp e nolofatsa litlhoko tse thata tsa OHS ka li-wizard tse bonolo ho sebelisoa le t≈°ehetso ea nako ea sebele ka chatbot ea rona e matlafatsoang ke AI. E t≈°ehelitsoe ke melao ea Afrika Borwa le mekhoa e metle, re fa likhoebo matla a ho theha libaka tsa mosebetsi tse sireletsehileng ha re ntse re netefatsa ho latela OHSA le COIDA. Kopanela le ba likete ba litsebi tse it≈°etlehileng ka SafetyHelp ho sireletsa lihlopha tsa bona le ho nolofatsa mekhoa ea t≈°ireletso.
legal_obligations.client.title: Boikarabello ba Moreki
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Molao oa Kaho 5(1)(a): Lokisetsa Tlhahlobo ea Kotsi ea Motheo (BRA) e hlalosang likotsi tsa morero.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Molao oa Kaho 5(1)(b): Fana ka Tlhaloso ea Bophelo bo Botle le T≈°ireletso e hlalosang litlhoko tse khethehileng tsa morero.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Molao oa Kaho 5(1)(l): Amohela Lenaneo la Bophelo bo Botle le T≈°ireletso la Mokonteraka pele mosebetsi o qala.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Boikarabello ba Mokonteraka
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Molao oa Kaho 7(1)(a): Romela Lenaneo la Bophelo bo Botle le T≈°ireletso le thehiloeng ho tlhaloso ea moreki.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Molao oa Kaho 7(1)(b): Boloka Faele ea Bophelo bo Botle le T≈°ireletso setsing se nang le litokomane tsohle tse hlokahalang.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Molao oa Kaho 9: Etsa Tlhahlobo ea Kotsi le Tlhahlobo ea Ho Hlahloba Kotsi ea T≈°ireletso (HIRAs) ka ho khetheha bakeng sa mosebetsi.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Boikarabello ba Setsebi sa Bophelo bo Botle le T≈°ireletso
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Molao oa Kaho 5(5): Baemeli (PrCHSA) ba laola Bophelo bo Botle le T≈°ireletso molemong oa moreki, ba netefatsa ho latela melao.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Molao oa Kaho 8(5): Baofisiri (CHSO) ba thusa bakonteraka ho kenya t≈°ebetsong le ho hlahloba litsamaiso tsa Bophelo bo Botle le T≈°ireletso.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Litaelo tsa SACPCMP: E tlameha ho boloka ngodiso le litlhoko tsa CPD bakeng sa boemo ba setsebi.

resources.description: Na u hloka thuso ea setsebi? Iteanye le litsebi tse netefalitsoeng bakeng sa litlhoko tsa morero oa hau.

footer.newsletter.title: Lula U na le Litaba
chatbot.welcome: Lumela! Nka u thusa joang ka OHS kajeno?
chatbot.response: Ke mona ho u thusa! Bakeng sa keletso ea OHS e etselitsoeng ka boikhethelo, ka kopo iteanye le setsebi.
page_title.construction: SafetyHelp - T≈°ireletso ea Bophelo bo Botle ho Kaho
construction.title: T≈°ireletso ea Bophelo bo Botle ho Kaho
construction.description: Netefatsa ho latela melao ea t≈°ireletso ea bophelo bo botle ho kaho ka ho sebelisa lisebelisoa tsa OHS tsa SafetyHelp. Lisebelisoa tsa rona li u thusa ho laola likotsi, ho latela litlhoko tsa molao, le ho sireletsa basebetsi setsing, ho latela mekhoa e metle e hlalositsoeng ho 'T≈°ireletso ea Pele: Metheo ea Meralo ea OHS.'
construction.download_link: Khoasolla Lenaneo la OHS la Kaho:
legal_appointments.title: Ho Khethoa ka Molao
legal_appointments.description: Laola ho khethoa ka molao ha t≈°ireletso ea bophelo bo botle ba mosebetsi joalo ka ha ho hlokoa ke melao ea OHS ea Afrika Borwa. Sebelisa organogram ho abela mesebetsi, tlatsa lintlha tsa ba khethiloeng, 'me u thehe tokomaneng e felletseng e kenyelletsang mangolo a ho khethoa, lirekoto tsa koetliso, le tse ling.
organogram.title: Organogram ea Ho Khethoa ka Molao ha OHS
organogram.form.name: Lebitso la Motho ea Khethiloeng
organogram.form.name_error: Ka kopo kenya lebitso la motho ea khethiloeng.
organogram.form.email_error: Ka kopo kenya imeile e sebetsang.
organogram.form.phone_error: Ka kopo kenya nomoro ea mohala e sebetsang (mohlala, +27123456789).
organogram.form.start_date_error: Ka kopo kenya letsatsi la ho qala.
organogram.form.training_error: Ka kopo kenya lintlha tsa koetliso/bokhoni.
legislation.title: Molao
legislation.description: Fumana laeborari e felletseng ea melao ea OHS, maemo, le lintlafatso. Theha lirejisetara tsa molao tsa OHS, batla melao e khethehileng, 'me u hlahlobe likamano pakeng tsa melao. Liphetolelo tse nolofalitsoeng lia fumaneha bakeng sa ho rekoa ho etsa hore litokomane tsa molao tse thata li utloisisoe habonolo.
legislation.tools.title: Lisebelisoa tsa Molao
legislation.updates.title: Lintlafatso tsa Molao le Litlhophiso tsa Molao
legislation.standards.title: Maemo a OHS
services.title: Lit≈°ebeletso tsa SafetyHelp
services.description: Hlahloba mefuta e fapaneng ea lit≈°ebeletso tsa t≈°ireletso ea bophelo bo botle ba mosebetsi tse etselitsoeng ho t≈°ehetsa libaka tsa mosebetsi, likolo, likereke, le likarolo tse sa hlophisoang ka bophara ho Afrika Borwa. Ho tloha ho boeletsi ho ea koetlisong, SafetyHelp e fana ka litharollo tse etselitsoeng ho netefatsa ho latela melao le t≈°ireletso.
services.consulting.title: Boeletsi ba OHS
services.consulting.description: Fumana boeletsi ba setsebi mabapi le ho latela OHS, tsamaiso ea kotsi, le ho khethoa ka molao ho tsoa ho litsebi tsa rona tse netefalitsoeng. Re sebelisane le mekhatlo e kang Anglo Platinum, ABSA, le Metrorail ho fana ka litharollo tse etselitsoeng ka boikhethelo.
services.training.title: Mananeo a Koetliso
services.training.description: Fumana mananeo a koetliso a felletseng a akaretsang liindasteri tsohle, ho kenyelletsa kaho, tlhahiso, le thuto. Khetha koetliso ea ho qala, lithuto tse khethehileng tsa boemo, le tse ling, tsohle li latela melao ea OHS ea Afrika Borwa.
services.audits.title: Tlhahlobo le Litlhahlobo
services.audits.description: Netefatsa hore sebaka sa hau sa mosebetsi se latela maemo a OHS ka lit≈°ebeletso tsa rona tsa tlhahlobo le litlhahlobo. Lisebelisoa tsa rona li u thusa ho etsa tlhahlobo e felletseng, ho hlahisa litlaleho, le ho kenya t≈°ebetsong mehato ea ho lokisa.
services.risk_management.title: Mananeo a Tsamaiso ea Kotsi
services.risk_management.description: Theha mananeo a tsamaiso ea kotsi (RMPs) a etselitsoeng a kenyelletsang melao ea Afrika Borwa, melao ea bomasepala, le maemo a machaba a kang ISO 45001, ho netefatsa hore khoebo ea hau e itokiselitse likotsi life kapa life.
services.support.title: T≈°ehetso le Lisebelisoa tsa Sechaba
services.support.description: Kopanela le sechaba sa rona ho tlaleha liketsahalo, ho fumana manane a tlhahlobo ea t≈°ireletso bakeng sa mabenkele a spaza, likolo, le litavern, le ho iteanya le litsebi tse ling tsa OHS bakeng sa t≈°ehetso le t≈°ebelisano.
training.title: Koetliso e Felletseng ea Sebaka sa Mosebetsi
training.description: Hlahloba mananeo a rona a koetliso a felletseng a sebaka sa mosebetsi ho netefatsa ho latela melao ea OHS ea Afrika Borwa le ho khothaletsa tikoloho e sireletsehileng ea mosebetsi. Khetha koetliso ea ts'ebetso, koetliso ea sehlopha, kapa sebelisa wizard ea rona ho fumana likhothaletso tse etselitsoeng ka boikhethelo bakeng sa indasteri ea hau, batho bao u ba lebisitseng, le sebaka.

Bakeng sa litharollo tsa OHS tse etselitsoeng ka boikhethelo, iteanye le SafetyHelp ho support@safetyhelp.co.za kapa ketela Leqephe la ho Iteanya.
training.checkout.success: Tefo e Atlehile! Lisebelisoa tsa hau tsa koetliso li thehiloe. Khoasolla PDF tsa hau ka tlase. Bakeng sa koetliso ea inthaneteng, likhoutu tsa ho kena li rometsoe ho uena ka imeile.

training.manual.purchase.description: Fumana bukana ea koetliso e felletseng e etselitsoeng khampani ea hau, e kenyelletsang litlhoko tsa molao, litaba tse etselitsoeng ka boikhethelo ho latela boemo ba hau ba kotsi, le litheko ho tsoa ho bafani ba koetliso ba netefalitsoeng.

training.list.add_to_cart: Kenya tse Khethiloeng ka Har'a Basket
training.legal_fact.step_1: Nnete ea Molao: Karolo 8 ea Molao oa OHS e hloka hore bahiri ba fane ka koetliso e etselitsoeng ka boikhethelo bakeng sa likotsi tse khethehileng tsa sebaka sa mosebetsi.
training.fun_fact.step_2: Nnete e Thabisang: Na u tseba hore koetliso ea kamehla e ka fokotsa liketsahalo tsa sebaka sa mosebetsi ho fihla ho 30%?
training.legal_fact.step_3: Nnete ea Molao: Bomasepala ba lehae ba ka ba le melao ea OHS e fapaneng e amang litlhoko tsa koetliso.
training.fun_fact.step_4: Nnete e Thabisang: Libaka tsa mosebetsi tse nang le likotsi tse phahameng tse kang libaka tsa kaho li hloka koetliso ea kamehla ho boloka maemo a t≈°ireletso.
training.legal_fact.step_5: Nnete ea Molao: Molao oa OHS o hloka koetliso e khethehileng bakeng sa mesebetsi e kang baemeli ba SHE ho netefatsa ho latela melao.

legislation.wizard.step_4.description: Hlahloba lintlha tsa hau 'me u thehe RMP ea hau. U ka eketsa melao e eketsehileng haeba ho hlokahala.
legislation.cart.title: Tefo
legislation.cart.description: RMP ea hau e thehiloe! Sebelisa khoutu ea voucher FREERMP2025 ho khoasolla mahala (basebelisi ba pele ba 100).
suppliers.title: Lenane la Bafani ba OHS
suppliers.description: Fumana le ho t≈°oaea bafani ba OHS Afrika Borwa. Sefa ka sebaka, lit≈°ebeletso, le tse netefalitsoeng. Romela maikutlo ho thusa ba bang ho etsa liqeto tse nang le tsebo.
suppliers.list.title: Lenane la Bafani
suppliers.table.name: Lebitso la Mofani
suppliers.review_form.title: Romela Maikutlo
community_tools.title: Lisebelisoa tsa T≈°ireletso ea Sechaba
community_tools.description: Tlaleha liketsahalo tsa t≈°ireletso kapa kotsi sechabeng sa hau kapa sebakeng sa hau sa mosebetsi, ho tloha likoting ho ea ho lisebelisoa tse senyehileng. Sebelisa lisebelisoa tsa rona ho netefatsa t≈°ireletso libakeng tse kang mabenkele a spaza, likolo, lipetlele, le litavern.
community_tools.incident_report.title: Tlaleha Ketsahalo kapa Kotsi
community_tools.incident_report.location: Sebaka se tla tsejoa ka bo ikgetseng...
community_tools.incident_report.weather_: Boemo ba leholimo bo tla tsejoa ka bo ikgetseng...
community_tools.incident_report.descript: Hlalosa ketsahalo kapa kotsi (mohlala, sekoti Mmileng oa Main, setulo se robehileng setsing sa sechaba)...
community_tools.incident_report.user_con: Lintlha tsa ho Iteanya le Hau (Ka Boikhethelo):
Kenya mohala kapa imeile ea hau...
community_tools.incident_report.user_soc: Lebitso la Hau la Sechaba (Ka Boikhethelo, mohlala, @username ho X):
Kenya lebitso la hau la X...
community_tools.incident_report.provider: Lintlha tsa ho Iteanya le Mofani oa T≈°ebeletso (Ka Boikhethelo):
Kenya mohala kapa imeile (e tla tlatswa ka bo ikgetseng haeba mofani a khethiloe)...
Lebitso la Sechaba la Mofani oa T≈°ebeletso (Ka Boikhethelo, mohlala, @CityofJoburgZA ho X):
Kenya lebitso la X (le tla tlatswa ka bo ikgetseng haeba mofani a khethiloe)...

community_tools.list.title: Lisebelisoa tse Ling tsa T≈°ireletso ea Sechaba
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.title: Lenane la Tlhahlobo ea OHS ea Lebenkele la Spaza
community_tools.list.spaza_shop.descript: Netefatsa hore lebenkele la hau la spaza le latela t≈°ireletso ea mollo, motlakase, le litlhoko tsa kaho ho latela melao ea bomasepala le Molao oa OHS.
community_tools.list.school.title: Tataiso ea T≈°ireletso ea Mollo ea Sekolo
community_tools.list.school.description: Ithute litlhoko tsa molao tsa t≈°ireletso ea mollo likolong, ho kenyelletsa mananeo a ho baleha le lisebelisoa.
community_tools.list.hospital.title: Tataiso ea Ho Itokisetsa Maemo a T≈°ohanyetso ea Sepetlele
community_tools.list.hospital.descriptio: Netefatsa hore lipetlele li itokiselitse maemo a t≈°ohanyetso ka mananeo a ho baleha a nepahetseng le lisebelisoa tsa t≈°ireletso.
community_tools.list.tavern.title: Lenane la Tlhahlobo ea T≈°ireletso ea Tavern
community_tools.list.tavern.description: Hlahloba hore na litavern li latela melao ea t≈°ireletso ea mollo le tsamaiso ea bongata ho thibela liketsahalo.
dashboard.title: Dashboard ea Setho
dashboard.welcome: Amoheloa, [Lebitso la Motho ea Sebelisang]! Laola ho latela ha hau ka OHS, RMPs, litlhahlobo tsa bafani, le litlaleho tsa sechaba mona.

document_categories.title: Theha Litokomane tsa Hau tsa Sistimi ea Tsamaiso ea OHS
document_categories.description: Khetha le ho theha litokomane tseo u li hlokang bakeng sa sistimi ea hau ea tsamaiso ea OHS. Khetha ho tsoa ho melao, mekhoa, maemo, le tse ling, tse etselitsoeng litlhoko tsa mokhatlo oa hau ka boikhethelo.
document_categories.policies.title: Melao
document_categories.policies.description: Lipolelo tsa maemo a holimo tsa sepheo le boitlamo, tse amohetsoeng ke baokameli ba phahameng.
